QueryResult.text: SELECT r.id RESOURCE_ID, s.slice_date QUARTER_START_DATE, ROUND(CASE WHEN NVL(c.fte,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (s.slice / c.fte) * 100 END,2) AVAIL_L_PERCENT, ROUND(CASE WHEN NVL(c.fte,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE s.slice / c.fte END,2) AVAIL_L_FTE FROM srm_resources r INNER JOIN prj_blb_slices s ON r.id = s.prj_object_id INNER JOIN prj_blb_slicerequests sr ON s.slice_request_id = sr.id INNER JOIN rpt_calendar c ON s.slice_date = c.start_date WHERE (sr.request_name = 'QUARTERLYRESOURCEAVAILCURVE') AND (c.period_type = 'QUARTERLY') AND r.resource_type = 0
